import React from 'react'; import { AppBar, Flex, Card, Button, IconButton, Box, Divider, Typography, css, Avatar, Dialog, Backdrop, List, Snackbar, Spacer, Stack, Paper, Frame, TextBox, Switch, useComponentState, } from './components/UI'; import useApp from './hooks/useApp'; import { Smiley, Close, Github, Search, Lock, Dribble } from './icons'; import './style.css'; export default function App() { const { search } = useApp() const {state, toggle, setState} = useComponentState({open: false}); const { open, param, results } = state; return (
Rachet-UI window.open('http://docs.ratchet-ui.com')} className="toolbar-button">Docs window.open('http://sql.ratchet-ui.com')} className="toolbar-button">Ratchet-SQL window.open('http://sql.ratchet-ui.com')} className="toolbar-button">Stackblitz toggle('open')} align="center" className="search-box"> Search... Ctrl+K window.open('https://github.com/miltonejones/rachet-react-ui')} mr={16} ml={2} size="small"> The React Component Library literally nobody asked for. Ratchet-UI provides a light-weight, customizable, and open-source library of component starter classes, enabling you to create the framework you need for your application. Check security status Check the Storybook to learn more about our components and tools a Hatsune Miku wedding confirmed Rumors of Donald Duck lawsu... To-do List} items={['apples', 'pears', 'oranges', 'world peace'].map(x=>{x})} /> toggle('open')} open={open} width="500px" height="500px"> Search the component list setState('results', search(v.target.value))} /> {!!results && ( Results from the Ratchet-UI Documentation ( linkOf(b)} mt={2} mb={2} > {b} ))} /> )}
); } // https://docs.ratchet-ui.com/?path=/docs/components-data-display--avatar const linkOf = (desc) => { const array = desc.split(':') const cat = array[0].trim().replace(/\s/g, '-') const com = array[1].trim().replace(/\s/g, '-') const uri = `https://docs.ratchet-ui.com/?path=/docs/components-${cat}--${com}`; window.open(uri) };
